rooms.description: Wide entrance with a foyer, integrating Vastu principles to welcome positive energy; includes storage for shoes and outdoor gear.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east facade, providing ample natural light in accordance with Vastu guidelines; Bohemian decor with eclectic furnishing.
Open-plan dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for social gatherings and meals.

Modern kitchen with integrated island; floor-to-ceiling windows on one side for ventilation; designed according to Vastu principles where the south-east direction is considered auspicious for cooking.
Functional bathroom with a bathtub and essential fixtures; placed strategically per Vastu guidelines to avoid water elements clashing.

openings.description: Two-car garage located at the west side of the plot, featuring large sliding doors for ease of access and minimal interference with Vastu principles.
Primary entrance door on the north facade ensuring smooth flow from the garden to interior spaces, complemented by floor-to-ceiling windows for a modern aesthetic.

garden.description: Expansive garden area providing a serene outdoor space; designed with native plants and water features, incorporating Vastu recommendations for positive energy.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a private balcony; designed with Bohemian interior decor and large windows to maintain natural light while preserving privacy.
Secondary bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample ventilation, adhering to Vastu by ensuring a calm and restful atmosphere.
Additional bedroom designed for guest use or children; includes access to an outdoor balcony with Bohemian-inspired decor, ensuring Vastu compliance by orienting windows towards favorable directions.
Cozy study room with a view to the garden; designed for concentration and creativity, ensuring proper sunlight and air flow according to Vastu principles.
Functional bathroom in proximity to the master bedroom; designed with water element considerations per Vastu guidelines to maintain energy balance.

openings.description: Balconies adjacent to bedrooms for natural light and ventilation, carefully placed to follow Vastu guidelines.
Staircase connecting ground and first floor, designed with minimal obstruction and natural light exposure.

rooms.description: Luxurious master suite offering a blend of Bohemian aesthetic and modern luxury; includes a large master bedroom, private bathroom with a soaking tub, and an integrated dressing area. Floor-to-ceiling windows ensure ample natural light while preserving privacy.
Secondary bedroom designed for additional space or a home office; features floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance illumination and air quality per Vastu principles.
A guest suite that offers privacy with an en-suite bathroom; designed to be cozy yet elegant, featuring Bohemian style elements and natural lighting.
Multi-functional study area that can serve as an office; designed with ample window space for inspiration and adherence to Vastu energy flow.

openings.description: Balconies integrated into the master suite and guest suite for outdoor seating, ensuring Vastu compliance with orientation to positive energy.
Staircase connecting first and second floors, designed to be both functional and aesthetically pleasing while ensuring natural light exposure.

vastu_considerations: East-facing windows for living areas to attract positive energy
South-eastern placement of the kitchen for auspicious culinary space
Avoidance of water elements near entrance
Northward openings for enhanced light and air flow
